name: NOTD backup
short_description:
Tool for automated backup of NOTD game (SC2 mod)

v1.2 -> Added option to check complete player stats

A word on how to integrate with Dropbox. I will not integrate tool with Dropbox, as the effort outweighs benefit - you can configure backup using Dropbox tools yourself.

Put the destination directory of tool to Dropbox directory e.g. assuming "c:\Users\user1\Dropbox" is Dropbox directory, place it to e.g. "c:\Users\user1\Dropbox\SaveGameBackup\NOTD_Backup", and include it for sync with Dropbox.

Also, when on matter, you can backup your complete SC2 bank files. For that you need to place Dropbox directory on same drive as the where the SC2 bank files are created, then just make a junction:
Code:
c:\Users\user1\Dropbox\SaveGameBackup>mklink /J StarCraft2Banks "c:\Users\user1\Documents\StarCr
aft II\Accounts"
Junction created for StarCraft2Banks <<===>> c:\Users\user1\Documents\StarCraft II\Accounts

c:\Users\user1\Dropbox\SaveGameBackup>
